name: The Legend of Horse Girl
description:
Welcome to Santa Diablo, Texas, a tiny desert town held in the grip of fear by a corrupt judge and his gang of outlaws. No one dares to stand against these rustlers. No one, that is, until the fateful day that SHE came to town...

She's a mysterious drifter without a name and her name is... Horse Girl.

And she aims to clean up this one horse town.

The Legend of Horse Girl is an acid western adventure by Bitter Karella made in Inform 7.
